Variables
DEBUG_MODE

Variables for debugging purposes.  Used by functions that print to serial using a debug version of printlnToSerial

STATE_PRINT

Used by a function called d_printStates.

Types
States

Declaring different state types via ENUM type.

Variables
current_state

responsible for pointing to a current state

prev_state

responsible for pointing to a previous state

target_turn_state

Variable for the TURN state to use and for others to set up.

user_char_flag

Variable for recording last user's character press

Functions
setup

Performs initialisation operations before zumo starts running

loop

Runs runCurrentState functions to execute a current state.
